languages.text: Судя по сытой морде дельца, ржавое барахло на прилавке выложено для отвода глаз, а более ценный — и наверняка нелегальный — товар до поры припрятан от посторонних.

traits.locale_text: Ржавое барахло на прилавке выложено для отвода глаз. Настоящие нелегальные товары где-то припрятаны, а делец терпеливо ждет знающего покупателя.

languages.text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.
languages.original_text: Судя по сытой морде дельца, ржавое барахло на прилавке выложено для отвода глаз, а более ценный — и наверняка нелегальный — товар до поры припрятан от посторонних.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

languages.text: 从这个商人满面红光的圆脸来判断，摆放在柜台上的那些生锈的垃圾不过是个幌子，用来掩饰那些更值钱的商品。那些商品很可能是违法商品，目前已经被藏了起来，不允许过往的人随意打量。
languages.original_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

traits.locale_text: 从这个商人满面红光的圆脸来判断，摆放在柜台上的那些生锈的垃圾不过是个幌子，用来掩饰那些更值钱的商品。那些商品很可能是违法商品，目前已经被藏了起来，不允许过往的人随意打量。

languages.text: A juzgar por el orondo y mofletudo rostro del mercader, la chatarra oxidada que exhibe en su puesto no es más que una tapadera para el negocio más lucrativo (y seguramente ilegal) que de momento mantiene oculto de miradas furtivas.
languages.original_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por el orondo y mofletudo rostro del mercader, la chatarra oxidada que exhibe en su puesto no es más que una tapadera para el negocio más lucrativo (y seguramente ilegal) que de momento mantiene oculto de miradas furtivas.

languages.text: 商人の丸く肥えた顔から察するに、カウンターに並べられた錆びたガラクタは、より価値のある、おそらく違法な商品のための煙幕にすぎない。これらはまだ人目につかない商品だ。
languages.original_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

traits.locale_text: 商人の丸く肥えた顔から察するに、カウンターに並べられた錆びたガラクタは、より価値のある、おそらく違法な商品のための煙幕にすぎない。これらはまだ人目につかない商品だ。

languages.text: Dem wohlgenährten Gesicht des Händlers zufolge ist der rostige Krempel auf seinem Tresen wohl eher eine Tarnung für seine wertvolleren – und vermutlich illegalen – Waren, die nun vor neugierigen Blicken geschützt sind.
languages.original_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

traits.locale_text: Dem wohlgenährten Gesicht des Händlers zufolge ist der rostige Krempel auf seinem Tresen wohl eher eine Tarnung für seine wertvolleren – und vermutlich illegalen – Waren, die nun vor neugierigen Blicken geschützt sind.

languages.text: À en juger par le visage poupin et bien nourri du vendeur, la ferraille rouillée exposée sur son comptoir n'est guère qu'un écran de fumée destiné à dissimuler ses marchandises plus précieuses, et probablement illégales, stockées à l'abri des regards.
languages.original_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par le visage poupin et bien nourri du vendeur, la ferraille rouillée exposée sur son comptoir n'est guère qu'un écran de fumée destiné à dissimuler ses marchandises plus précieuses, et probablement illégales, stockées à l'abri des regards.

languages.text: Tüccarın yuvarlak ve tombul yüzüne bakılırsa tezgâha yayılan paslı ıvır zıvır, şimdilerde boş bakışlardan gizlenmiş çok daha değerli ve muhtemelen yasa dışı mallar için yalnızca bir paravandan ibaret.
languages.original_text: Judging by the merchant's round, well-fed face, the rusty junk laid out on the counter is merely a smokescreen for the more valuable — and likely illegal — goods that are for now hidden from idle glances.
